entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
